HomePage.title: ArduinoLab
HomePage.description: Your centralized library for school robotics. Document your projects, share step-by-step guides, and download code & 3D models to build amazing robots together.

AboutPage.title: About ArduinoLab
AboutPage.subtitle: Empowering students to build, share, and learn together.
AboutPage.missionText: ArduinoLab was created with a simple goal: to make school robotics projects accessible, shareable, and reproducible. We believe that the best way to learn is by doingâ€”and by sharing what you've built with others.
AboutPage.storyText: What started as a small club project has grown into a platform for documenting innovation. We want to replace messy folders and lost files with a beautiful, organized library of knowledge.
AboutPage.teamText: Whether you are a club leader, a curious student, or a teacher, ArduinoLab is your space to showcase creativity.
